segment.source: A simple and effective tool for managing customer records in beauty salons and other businesses
segment.target: Et enkelt og effektivt værktøj til at administrere kunderegistre i skønhedssaloner og andre virksomheder

segment.source: Bee O’clock is a unique management tool allowing your customers to book and pay for your services. You can also keep track of your performance to become the best version of yourself.
segment.target: Bee O’clock er et unikt ledelsesværktøj, der giver dine kunder mulighed for at booke og betale for dine tjenester. Du kan også holde styr på din præstation for at blive den bedste version af dig selv.

segment.source: appointment, calendar, clients, business, management, tool, bookkeeping, tax planning, event management, delegate, time-consuming tasks, empower, professionals, reduce stress, increase productivity, eliminate distractions, frustrations, running a business
segment.target: Bee O’clock, ledelsesværktøj, tjenester, præstation, version

segment.source: Forget about confusion with records. Our service automates customer onboarding processes, allowing you to focus on your work, not on record administration.
segment.target: Glem alt om forvirring med registreringer. Vores service automatiserer onboarding-processer for kunder, så du kan fokusere på dit arbejde, ikke på administration af journaler.

segment.source: Make sure your customers always remember their visit! Automatic SMS and email reminders will ensure that your clients arrive on time and reduce the number of missed appointments.
segment.target: Sørg for, at dine kunder altid husker deres besøg! Automatiske SMS- og e-mail-påmindelser sikrer, at dine kunder kommer til tiden og reducerer antallet af ubesvarede aftaler.

segment.source: Make Bee o'clock a part of your brand! You can customize each interface of the service to your style and brand, which allows you to individualize your workflows.
segment.target: Gør Bee o'clock til en del af dit brand! Du kan tilpasse hver grænseflade i tjenesten til din stil og dit brand, hvilket giver dig mulighed for at individualisere dine arbejdsgange.

segment.source: All information is at your fingertips - you can access customer history, schedules, and records from any device. You can make decisions anywhere and anytime.
segment.target: Alle oplysninger er lige ved hånden - du kan få adgang til kundehistorik, tidsplaner og optegnelser fra enhver enhed. Du kan træffe beslutninger hvor som helst og når som helst.

segment.source: Create an account: Fill in basic information about your business, add address and contact details.
segment.target: Opret en konto: Udfyld grundlæggende oplysninger om din virksomhed, tilføj adresse og kontaktoplysninger.

segment.source: Add your services: Specify the list of services, their duration and cost.
segment.target: Tilføj dine tjenester: Angiv listen over tjenester, deres varighed og pris.

segment.source: Control your schedule: Get notified about new recordings, view and manage your schedule in a convenient interface.
segment.target: Styr din tidsplan: Få besked om nye optagelser, se og administrer din tidsplan i en praktisk grænseflade.

segment.source: Convenient booking: Customers book a service and a convenient time online, without calling or waiting.
segment.target: Praktisk booking: Kunder bestiller en service og en bekvem tid online uden at ringe eller vente.

segment.source: Track your success: Analyze your record and customer activity statistics to improve your service.
segment.target: Spor din succes: Analyser din rekord og kundeaktivitetsstatistikker for at forbedre din service.

segment.source: Get a unique link to your record page and share it via website, social media, or email.
segment.target: Få et unikt link til din rekordside, og del det via din hjemmeside, sociale medier eller e-mail.

segment.source: Service for business: Simple online customer registration.
segment.target: Service til virksomheder: Enkel online kunderegistrering.

segment.source: Order a demo access to the online customer recording service, a convenient solution without registration.
segment.target: Bestil en demoadgang til online-kundeoptagelsestjenesten, en praktisk løsning uden registrering.

segment.source: Choose the best option for your business
segment.target: Vælg den bedste løsning til din virksomhed

segment.source: How quickly can you get started with Bee o’clock?
segment.target: Hvor hurtigt kan du komme i gang med Bee o'clock?

segment.source: Starting to use the service is very simple:
segment.target: Det er meget enkelt at begynde at bruge tjenesten:

segment.source: register on the platform, add basic information about your business and services, and the system will be ready to go. You have the option to use the free plan (Free) with basic functionality, which will allow you to immediately test the key features of Bee o’clock without any costs.
segment.target: registrer dig på platformen, tilføj grundlæggende oplysninger om din virksomhed og tjenester, og systemet er klar til brug. Du har mulighed for at bruge den gratis plan (gratis) med grundlæggende funktionalitet, som giver dig mulighed for straks at teste nøglefunktionerne i Bee o'clock uden omkostninger.

segment.source: What features does Bee o’clock provide and how does it differ from other services?
segment.target: Hvilke funktioner tilbyder Bee o'clock, og hvordan adskiller det sig fra andre tjenester?

segment.source: Bee o’clock offers a comprehensive set
segment.target: Bee o'clock tilbyder et omfattende sæt
værktøjer til at automatisere online bookinger

segment.source: Automation of bookings: the system automatically records new bookings and reserves time in the calendar.
segment.target: Automatisering af bookinger: systemet registrerer automatisk nye bookinger og reserverer tid i kalenderen.

segment.source: Reminders to clients: SMS and e-mail notifications will help reduce the number of missed appointments.
segment.target: Påmindelser til kunder: SMS- og e-mail-meddelelser hjælper med at reducere antallet af ubesvarede aftaler.

segment.source: Customization for your brand: you can change the appearance of your public page and customize the interface to suit your business.
segment.target: Tilpasning til dit brand: Du kan ændre udseendet af din offentlige side og tilpasse grænsefladen, så den passer til din virksomhed.

segment.source: Online booking management: the entire schedule is always at hand and can be accessed from a smartphone or computer.
segment.target: Online bookingstyring: Hele tidsplanen er altid ved hånden og kan tilgås fra en smartphone eller computer.

segment.source: Analytics and development: the service tracks statistics so you can improve customer interactions.
segment.target: Analyse og udvikling: Tjenesten sporer statistik, så du kan forbedre kundeinteraktioner.

segment.source: Various pricing plans: from free to advanced PRO, with the ability to connect an AI assistant and public REST API.
segment.target: Forskellige prisplaner: fra gratis til avanceret PRO, med mulighed for at forbinde en AI-assistent og offentlig REST API.

segment.source: How to set up and manage online bookings in Bee o’clock?
segment.target: Hvordan opsætter og administrerer man online reservationer i Bee o'clock?

segment.source: Everything happens in a few simple steps
segment.target: Alt sker i nogle få enkle trin

segment.source: Register on the platform: create an account and enter your business details.
segment.target: Tilmeld dig på platformen: Opret en konto og indtast dine virksomhedsoplysninger.

segment.source: Service settings: add a list of services, set the duration and price.
segment.target: Tjenesteindstillinger: Tilføj en liste over tjenester, indstil varighed og pris.

segment.source: Invite customers: share a unique link to your profile via your website, social media, or email.
segment.target: Inviter kunder: Del et unikt link til din profil via dit websted, sociale medier eller e-mail.

segment.source: Online customer booking: customers can book a service in a few clicks, and you will receive notifications about each new booking.
segment.target: Online kundebooking: kunder kan booke en service med få klik, og du vil modtage meddelelser om hver ny booking.

segment.source: Manage your recordings: Conveniently change your schedule, track activity, and get notified about changes.
segment.target: Administrer dine optagelser: Skift nemt din tidsplan, spor aktivitet og få besked om ændringer.

segment.source: Analysis and development: View statistics to evaluate performance and improve your service.
segment.target: Analyse og udvikling: Se statistik for at evaluere ydeevne og forbedre din service.

segment.source: Can I accept online payments and receive notifications about successful transactions?
segment.target: Kan jeg acceptere onlinebetalinger og modtage meddelelser om vellykkede transaktioner?

segment.source: Yes, the BASIC and PRO plans have a Payment Confirmation feature that allows you to track customer payments. The service also sends SMS and email notifications so that you and your customers are always up to date with booking and payment updates. All this ensures safe and transparent transactions.
segment.target: Ja, BASIC- og PRO-planerne har en betalingsbekræftelse funktion, der giver dig mulighed for at spore kundebetalinger. Tjenesten sender også SMS og e-mail notifikationer, så du og dine kunder altid er opdateret med booking- og betalingsopdateringer. Alt dette sikrer sikre og gennemsigtige transaktioner.

segment.source: What tariff plans are available and how do they differ?
segment.target: Hvilke takstplaner er tilgængelige, og hvordan adskiller de sig?

segment.source: Free ( ): 1 user, public page, admin panel, SEO Package, JSON LD, e-mail notifications. Suitable for small projects or testing.
segment.target: Free ( ): 1 bruger, offentlig side, admin panel, SEO pakke, JSON LD, e-mail notifikationer. Velegnet til små projekter eller test.

segment.source: Basic ( ): 5 users, public page, admin panel, SEO Package, JSON LD, email notifications, unlimited plugins, Payment Confirmation and SMS Notifications. Solution for small and medium businesses.
segment.target: Basic ( ): 5 brugere, offentlig side, adminpanel, SEO-pakke, JSON LD, e-mail-beskeder, ubegrænsede plugins, betalingsbekræftelse og sms-beskeder. Løsning til små og mellemstore virksomheder.

segment.source: Pro ( ): unlimited users, full access to features, including AI assistant and Public REST API. Ideal for advanced and scalable projects.
segment.target: Pro ( ): ubegrænsede brugere, fuld adgang til funktioner, inklusive AI-assistent og Public REST API. Ideel til avancerede og skalerbare projekter.

segment.source: Do you have any questions or suggestions?
If you have any additional questions about using Bee o’clock or would like to share ideas for improving the service, we are always ready to listen! Contact us in any convenient way:
segment.target: Hvis du har yderligere spørgsmål om brugen af ​​Bee o'clock eller gerne vil dele ideer til at forbedre servicen, er vi altid klar til at lytte! Kontakt os på enhver bekvem måde:

segment.source: Join our community to be the first to receive useful tips, news, and promotional offers:
segment.target: Tilmeld dig vores fællesskab for at være den første til at modtage nyttige tips, nyheder og kampagnetilbud:

segment.source: Follow us on social media and be the first to know about updates and new features of Bee o’clock.
segment.target: Følg os på sociale medier og vær den første til at vide om opdateringer og nye funktioner i Bee o'clock.

segment.source: If you prefer to write directly here on the website, fill out the form below - we will try to respond as quickly as possible, usually within 24 hours.
segment.target: Hvis du foretrækker at skrive direkte her på hjemmesiden, så udfyld formularen herunder - vi vil forsøge at svare hurtigst muligt, normalt indenfor 24 timer.

segment.source: Message subject (for example: "Questions about tariffs", "Technical support")
Message text (please indicate your request or suggestion)
segment.target: Besked tekst (angiv venligst din anmodning eller dit forslag)

segment.source: The form has been successfully submitted!
